title: Lonely Loser, I’ll Become Blonde Frivolous Gyaru’s Favourite (WN) - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Clingy Lover   Cute Story   First Love   Hard-Working Protagonist   Inferiority Complex   Loner Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   R-15   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Tsundere   Younger Sisters
author: Osakabe Daisuke   刑部大輔
description:
Ichijou Jun is a high-school student. However, he is a loner and even on lunch break the only thing he does is studying. As a result of great effort, his test ranking rose and while he was satisfied with his loner life,

– Hi-hi-hi… Virgin, teach me agaain♪

– Shut up, bitch. Let’s finish it quick today, OK?

– Yay!

One day, it was decided that he will help blonde gyaru Tachibana Karen, central figure of the class, with her studies. Loner during lunch break, tête-à-tête studying after school… So continues the double life.

Tsundere-like, but good at taking care of people Ichijou-kun.

A bit mischievous Tachibana-san with an innocent smile.

With this and that happening, the two get along so well that others cringe.>
